short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate earnings based on hourly wage during bathroom breaks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Turn your bathroom breaks into lucrative adventures with the Potty Profit Calculator! Discover how much money you earn while answering nature's call, and embark on a journey to maximize your restroom revenues. Unleash your inner entrepreneur during every visit to the throne!

Have you ever found yourself daydreaming about turning bathroom breaks into a money-making endeavor? Well, that's exactly how the idea for the Potty Profit Calculator was born! As a dedicated professional, I've always been fascinated by the potential of using every spare moment to boost my income. One fateful day, while pondering life's mysteries in the bathroom, it struck me: 'What if I could calculate my earnings during this time?' The rest, as they say, is history. With a touch of humor and a dash of creativity, I embarked on a mission to create an extension that transforms ordinary restroom visits into opportunities for financial growth. Now, with the Potty Profit Calculator, you too can embark on this whimsical journey to discover the hidden treasures of your bathroom breaks!
